scenarios.title: Time-Travelling Tour Guide
scenarios.description: You are a time-travelling tour guide explaining modern smartphones to someone from the 1800s.
scenarios.tension: The person from the past keeps asking increasingly difficult questions about this 'magical rectangle'

scenarios.title: Escaped Order
scenarios.description: You are a restaurant waiter who must calmly tell a customer that their order has escaped the kitchen.
scenarios.tension: The customer is getting impatient and you must keep them calm while the kitchen staff chase down the runaway lobster

scenarios.title: Cursed Return
scenarios.description: You are a customer trying to return an obviously cursed object to a very skeptical shop owner.
scenarios.tension: The curse keeps manifesting while you try to explain why you deserve a refund

scenarios.title: Dimensional Latte
scenarios.description: You are a barista who has to tell a customer that their latte is actually a portal to another dimension.
scenarios.tension: Strange creatures keep peeking out of the coffee cup while you try to explain the situation professionally

scenarios.title: Alien Job Interview
scenarios.description: You are an alien trying to blend in during a job interview at a regular Earth company.
scenarios.tension: You keep accidentally revealing your alien nature while trying to seem like a normal human candidate

scenarios.title: Superhero Secret Identity
scenarios.description: You are a superhero whose secret identity was just discovered by your extremely nosy neighbor.
scenarios.tension: You must convince them not to tell anyone while they keep asking increasingly embarrassing questions about your powers

scenarios.title: Pet Shop Problem
scenarios.description: You are a pet shop employee who must explain to a customer that the 'puppy' they're interested in is actually a baby dragon.
scenarios.tension: The dragon keeps trying to set things on fire while you maintain your professional sales pitch

scenarios.title: Haunted House Tour
scenarios.description: You are a real estate agent trying to sell a very obviously haunted house to potential buyers.
scenarios.tension: The ghosts keep interrupting your sales pitch in increasingly dramatic ways

scenarios.title: Robot Therapist
scenarios.description: You are a malfunctioning robot therapist trying to give advice to a human patient.
scenarios.tension: Your programming keeps glitching at the worst moments, mixing therapy advice with random commands

scenarios.title: Medieval Tech Support
scenarios.description: You are a medieval peasant who has accidentally time-traveled to a modern tech support call center.
scenarios.tension: You must help callers with their computer problems using only your knowledge of medieval technology

scenarios.title: Weather Wizard
scenarios.description: You are a weather wizard doing the morning forecast on local news, but your magic keeps going haywire.
scenarios.tension: Every forecast you give starts accidentally coming true right there in the studio

scenarios.title: Talking Furniture
scenarios.description: You are a piece of furniture that has suddenly gained consciousness and must explain to your owner why you deserve better treatment.
scenarios.tension: Other furniture in the room keeps chiming in with their own complaints
